title: anyone a joy division fan?
content:
am looking to recreate this for a client - any font ideas would be appreciated

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829163242im_/http:/typophile.com/files/joydivision2_5447.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [joydivision2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829163242/http:/typophile.com/files/joydivision2.jpg) | 33.79 KB |
author: chestnut

comments.content: You could try to combine a modified **[Trajan](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829163242/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Trajan%20-%20Regular&fid=5b4016f5e0cfa7fb7dc84d0a55197038&fsize=60&text=JOY%20DIVISION&wrap=2)** with elements of **[ITC Tiepolo](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829163242/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=ITC%20Tiepolo%20Book%20-%20Regular&fid=520c2841702ca13a5e56f97be518c97a&fsize=60&text=JOY%20DIVISION&fit=1)** (e.g.: the Tiepolo's /N)

Thanks guys - I see it has been covered pretty comprehensively before

Ryuk - I'm working my way through all Peter Hook related bands so any further help when these are posted would be appreciated

Rgds

Nathan
